title: I am not able to write good stories in TAT (SSB). What should I include in my daily routine to make it? - Quora

response.answer_text: So for tat it's just general story but you have to level up your imagination just start writing one story everyday first without any picture only through imagination to get in ideas and slowly your imagination will come up and you can make good stories… Remember it's our actions that are more important in those stories not the stories make any general story but give genuine actions which you can.
